title: Sam Bankman-Fried’s request to postpone sentencing until May 2024 denied
description:
Former FTX CEO Sam Bankman-Fried has been denied an adjourned sentencing hearing, according to a court filing dated Dec. 20. Bankman-Fried’s legal team requested the sentencing hearing to be adjourned for four to six additional weeks, which would postpone sentencing into May 2024. title: 40% of American Investors Expect Crypto To Be Part of Their Future Portfolio, According to Grayscale Poll
description:
